name: Stoker
description:
Goal 

Keep the boiler running and disarm bombs the saboteur places on the train. 

Watch the steam gauge in the upper left corner, when it is low return to the furnace where you start and stand by the coal box to refill it. 

Keep an eye out for the bomb timer in the top-middle. If there is a timer, the saboteur has dropped a bomb somewhere on the train. Keep track of where he is (he runs along the top of the train) and get to it first!

See how long you can keep the train running and try for a high score. 

Controls (Keyboard)

- Left arrow: move left
- Up arrow: jump
- Right arrow: move right
- Spacebar: shoot

Controls (Gamepad)

- Left stick or D-pad Move
- A: Jump
- X: Shoot

Credits

Design and pixel art: Henri

Code: Mark

Sounds from freesounds, and bfxr. Music from the public domain.
